wow this was quite a ride
i'm not quite sure if shindo is an activist or some sort in real life
 but i do love how he discusses important issues in his work,
 not at the time of course though
you can really see how he brings important social problems
 that are pretty much swept under the rug
 the other work he did about the reality of a cow's life is an example

saki's end is tragic but it's really nothing new or special
this stuff has been happening for a long time, in every part of the world
probably hundreds of thousands of girls/young women are already a victim of this 
right this instant

what i really like about this chapter and this series as a whole is the salaryman, 
who only appears for two panels, just right before the end 
can you imagine going home from work or school and you find some 
naked pregnant homeless woman wearing rags and looking at you 
what would you honestly do?
a simple question but loaded with meaning depending on how you answer it
This is not okay
what the actual fuck

What about TSF Monogatari? Nothing really bad in that one. Still waiting for TSF Monogatari Append 4.0 to come out, focusing on gender bender Ryo. @Shiriizu Tamashi So that's what happened.

I think all of Shindol's worked is fucked up, it's interesting and entertaining.
I was hoping Saki could come back from it, but it just got worse and worse for her every chapter.
Fuck you, Shindol for this super fucked up ass ending.

but i'll still read what you put out..

Basically she was saving money to get out of that shit, then those guys beat her, make her miscarry and steal what she had?
Then she decide to escape from reality with drugs once again, one last dream and... death.
If this is what did happen (I'm not sure because I can't read japanese), fuck ShindoL, she was still trying and what happened in this chapter is just a cheap move too give her a bad ending.
This is TOO cruel. I'm usually ok with bad endings, but this went way too far, even for ShindoL standards.
anyone knows when to expect eng translation?
worst shit i ever read,i know that shindoL is a cruel son of a bitch,but this was pretty much
I was expecting a little redemption, but I shouldn't have...given the artist.
on many levels this shit really bothers men, which is why i tend to read tags more and avoid snuff

Yo what the fuck. This series had me depressed for more than a week straight. Like I'm just trying to fap bro, not go into deep depression and sadness. 
Hopefully she died in the end so she doesn't have to endure this shit anymore.
This is High Art.
I think she really changed But its really confusing that final

Best manga i have ever read.
Not even Oyster could achieve this. Uziga Waita  would be proud.
This is what i expected, ShindoL, as always delivered.

I don't know why people would feel emphaty with the girl, she herself forged her destiny.
She was too naïve, too pure. 
She lived in delusion and illusion.
Everyone used her, abused her, took advantage of her. Even her father did it.

I personally loved it, i will be looking forward for amazing works like this.
According to ShindoL's patreon, he'll be releasing all 7 chapters into a single volume with some touch-ups and perhaps added pages.

God damn it. Had a feeling she wasn't going to keep her promise and change. I hope those fuckers get a taste of karmic justice, and that salaryman was an asshole. How convenient those glasses were there for her to put, so she can see in the mirror, of the shy and innocent girl she once was. Unless, those were her glasses that she kept all this time. What if, the last 4 pages, weren't a what-if future, but the entire story was just Saki (is that her name? I forgot) reminiscing about her troubled past? Well, until a translation is released.
Holy shit I just I wanted to see birth.
So she died just like that? or was that ending with the daughter real?(I highly doubt it, but still). This shit is real depressing, didn't even fap to this chapter even once.
I'm not horny anymore smh...
ok... fuck you shindol, and thank you

My Japanese is very poor, but I tried translating it a bit. After her stomach was beaten in and her baby miscarried, she walked into the washroom and started saying "I'm sorry, I couldn't give birth to you." She injected some more drugs and entered a trance where she talked with her daughter. Her daughter named Hana said "Mom, are you okay? Where does it hurt?"

As the two conversed, I couldn't read most of it. But from what I can barley read, it said "That can't be, mom is okay now." I haven't cried this hard from a Hentai in awhile. Fuck.
Just because it's dark doesn't make this realistic.

yeah its weird, this bothered me a lot more than it should, guro just seems childish an mean spirited, I hate guro, but it affects me similarly to watching a slasher movie, that is to say, no real emotional connect, these are character who exist solely to get killed by the monster.  On the other hand, this legitimately bothered me, watching her slow spiral and to see it end it such an awful fashion.  Porn generally has very little substance by its nature, and somehow that makes the more realistic conclusion feel like a major betrayal.  Hentai frequently doesn't end on a high note, especially this kind, but its hardly ever so final, or so crushing...

I knew there was a chapter 7 for sure and I kept checking for updates. His/Her endings usually involve giving birth, but Shindol took this to another level. Kinda makes you stop fapping and think about life for a bit. As b2874747 points out, this scenario is very realistic, and personally none of the guro I have read over the years affected me on an emotional level as much as this has. Shindol's storytelling and artwork is as godly as ever, but I can't get myself to fap to this as all I can think of are all the people who have met their ends due to bad influences and drug addiction/abuse.
10/10 would read it with translation when it's out.
"Hentai" ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
Well that really took a turn for the deeply unpleasant...I know the whole story has been pretty dark and fucked up, but this...this isn't fun anymore...

You know, I get the whole "different strokes for different folks idea", but you're a piece of shit human being if you get aroused by this garbage. Seriously, consider getting professional help because you aren't normal. Fucking sickening.

An hallucination caused by the drugs. Sort of a "what if" that plays in her mind as she dies. It still amazes me how people were expecting another kind of ending from ShindoL.
She died? So who's the woman and child at the end?

Phew! Finally done! We never got to see her get laid while in her sexy nerd form, so I wasn't really that interested in it after the first chapter. But now that Shindol is done with this, I hope he does something more interesting. I never really found the premise for this comic that sexy nor shocking enough to find it interesting, so I'm glad it seems to be over. 

But who knows? Maybe in chapter 8 she will return as a ghost!
